bug.author: lluunn
bug.summary: kfctl delete should get the kubeconfig for the app first
bug.description: I think it currently just use kubeconfig directly, so it will delete the wrong one if kubeconfig is pointing at another cluster. cc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jlewi>@jlewi</denchmark-link>
